Aid.definition: to provide with what is useful in achieving an end [conspiracy to counsel or draft resisters "K. A. Cohen"] often used in the phrase aid and abet; see also abet vi
Aid.origin: [conspiracy to counsel or draft resisters "K. A. Cohen"]

1.definition: an act of aiding [render to the principal]

2.definition: help giventangible means of assistance (as money or supplies) [ to the disabled] [giving and comfort to the enemy]
